com.ulflander.minethat.model
Class Document

java.lang.Object
  com.ulflander.minethat.model.Text
      com.ulflander.minethat.model.Document
All Implemented Interfaces:
Storable
public class Document
extends Text
implements Storable

Document is the main model in processing. It holds main language and results, some metadatas, a processing status, the chapters and so on. Documents are hold by jobs.

Since:
2/24/14
Author:
Ulflander
See Also:
Job
